chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Type) (R : rel A A) (f : A -> A) (C : A -> Prop) (x y : A), Monotonic f (R ++> eq) -> R x y -> C (f x) -> C (f y)

Premises:
rel = fun A1 A2 : Type => A1 -> A2 -> Prop : Type -> Type -> Type Arguments rel (_ _)%type_scope
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments T
Inductive eq (A : Type) (x : A) : A -> Prop := eq_refl : x = x Arguments eq {A}%type_scope Arguments eq_refl {A}%type_scope {x}, [A] _
Fin.R : forall n : nat, Fin.t ?m -> Fin.t (n + ?m) where ?m : [ |- nat]
Notation Monotonic m R := (@ Monotonic _ m R)
Unnamed_thm2 : forall (A : Type) (a b : A) (R : rel A A) (f : A -> A) (p : A -> Prop), Monotonic f (R ++> R) -> Monotonic p (R --> impl) -> R a b -> p (f b) -> p (f a)
rel_all = fun (A B C : Type) (R : C -> rel A B) (x : A) (y : B) => forall c : C, R c x y : forall A B C : Type, (C -> rel A B) -> rel A B Arguments rel_all {A B C}%type_scope _%function_scope
rel_pull = fun (A B A' B' : Type) (f : A -> A') (g : B -> B') (R : rel A' B') (x : A) (y : B) => R (f x) (g y) : forall A B A' B' : Type, (A -> A') -> (B -> B') -> rel A' B' -> rel A B Arguments rel_pull {A B A' B'}%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope _%rel_scope
RCompose = fun (A B C : Type) (RAB : rel A B) (RBC : rel B C) (RAC : rel A C) => forall (x : A) (y : B) (z : C), RAB x y -> RBC y z -> RAC x z : forall A B C : Type, rel A B -> rel B C -> rel A C -> Prop Arguments RCompose {A B C}%type_scope (_ _ _)%rel_scope
RDecompose = fun (A B C : Type) (RAB : rel A B) (RBC : rel B C) (RAC : rel A C) => forall (x : A) (z : C), RAC x z -> exists y : B, (RAB x y /\ RBC y z)%type : forall A B C : Type, rel A B -> rel B C -> rel A C -> Prop Arguments RDecompose {A B C}%type_scope (_ _ _)%rel_scope
Related = fun (A B : Type) (f : A) (g : B) (R : rel A B) => R f g : forall A B : Type, A -> B -> rel A B -> Prop Arguments Related {A B}%type_scope _ _ _%rel_scope
rel_compose = fun (A B C : Type) (RAB : rel A B) (RBC : rel B C) (x : A) (z : C) => exists y : B, (RAB x y /\ RBC y z)%type : forall A B C : Type, rel A B -> rel B C -> rel A C Arguments rel_compose {A B C}%type_scope (_ _)%rel_scope
Unnamed_thm4 : forall (A : Type) (a b : A) (R : rel A A), R a b -> let f := fun x y : A * A => (inr (fst x), inl (snd y)) in Monotonic f (R * ⊤ ++> ⊤ * R ++> (⊥ + R) * (R + ⊥))
CandidateProperty = fun (A B : Type) (R' : rel A B) (f : A) (g : B) (_ : Prop) => R' f g : forall A B : Type, rel A B -> A -> B -> Prop -> Prop Arguments CandidateProperty {A B}%type_scope _%rel_scope _ _ _%type_scope
rel_push_sind : forall (A1 A2 B1 B2 : Type) (f : A1 -> B1) (g : A2 -> B2) (R : rel A1 A2) (P : B1 -> B2 -> SProp), (forall (x : A1) (y : A2), R x y -> P (f x) (g y)) -> forall (a : B1) (a0 : B2), R !! (f, g) a a0 -> P a a0
option_rel_some_inv : forall (A B : Type) (R : rel A B) (x : option A) (y : option B) (a : A), option_rel R x y -> x = Some a -> exists b : B, (y = Some b /\ R a b)%type
rgraph_queue_rect : forall (A : Type) (R : rel A A) (m : A) (P : rgraph_queue R m -> Type), P (rgraph_queue_nil R m) -> (forall (x : A) (r : forall y : A, R x y -> R m y) (r0 : rgraph_queue R m), P r0 -> P (rgraph_queue_cons R m x r r0)) -> forall r : rgraph_queue R m, P r
rgraph_queue_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : rel A A) (m : A) (P : rgraph_queue R m -> Prop), P (rgraph_queue_nil R m) -> (forall (x : A) (r : forall y : A, R x y -> R m y) (r0 : rgraph_queue R m), P r0 -> P (rgraph_queue_cons R m x r r0)) -> forall r : rgraph_queue R m, P r
rgraph_queue_rec : forall (A : Type) (R : rel A A) (m : A) (P : rgraph_queue R m -> Set), P (rgraph_queue_nil R m) -> (forall (x : A) (r : forall y : A, R x y -> R m y) (r0 : rgraph_queue R m), P r0 -> P (rgraph_queue_cons R m x r r0)) -> forall r : rgraph_queue R m, P r
rgraph_queue_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : rel A A) (m : A) (P : rgraph_queue R m -> SProp), P (rgraph_queue_nil R m) -> (forall (x : A) (r : forall y : A, R x y -> R m y) (r0 : rgraph_queue R m), P r0 -> P (rgraph_queue_cons R m x r r0)) -> forall r : rgraph_queue R m, P r
rel_pull_relim : forall (f : ?A -> ?A') (g : ?B -> ?B') (R : rel ?A' ?B') (x : ?A) (y : ?B) (P Q : Prop), RElim R (f x) (g y) P Q -> RElim (R @@ (f, g)) x y P Q where ?A : [ |- Type] ?B : [ |- Type] ?A' : [ |- Type] ?B' : [ |- Type]
KLR.klr_pullw_relim : forall (f : ?W1 -> ?W2) (R : ?W2 -> rel ?A ?B) (w : ?W1) (x : ?A) (y : ?B) (P Q : Prop), RElim (R (f w)) x y P Q -> RElim (KLR.klr_pullw f R w) x y P Q where ?W1 : [ |- Type] ?W2 : [ |- Type] ?A : [ |- Type] ?B : [ |- Type]
rel_push_rintro : forall (f : ?A1 -> ?B1) (g : ?A2 -> ?B2) (R : rel ?A1 ?A2) (x : ?A1) (y : ?A2), RIntro (R x y) R !! (f, g) (f x) (g y) where ?A1 : [ |- Type] ?A2 : [ |- Type] ?B1 : [ |- Type] ?B2 : [ |- Type]
forall_pointwise_relim : forall (R : forall x : ?V, rel (?FV1 x) (?FV2 x)) (f : forall x : ?V, ?FV1 x) (g : forall x : ?V, ?FV2 x) (v : ?V) (P Q : Prop), RElim (R v) (f v) (g v) P Q -> RElim (forallr - @ v, R v) f g P Q where ?V : [ |- Type] ?FV1 : [ |- ?V -> Type] ?FV2 : [ |- ?V -> Type]
arrow_rel = fun (A1 A2 B1 B2 : Type) (RA : rel A1 A2) (RB : rel B1 B2) (f : A1 -> B1) (g : A2 -> B2) => forall (x : A1) (y : A2), RA x y -> RB (f x) (g y) : forall A1 A2 B1 B2 : Type, rel A1 A2 -> rel B1 B2 -> rel (A1 -> B1) (A2 -> B2) Arguments arrow_rel {A1 A2 B1 B2}%type_scope (RA RB)%rel_scope : rename
arrow_pointwise_rintro : forall (R : rel ?B1 ?B2) (f : ?A -> ?B1) (g : ?A -> ?B2), RIntro (forall x : ?A, R (f x) (g x)) (- ==> R) f g where ?A : [ |- Type] ?B1 : [ |- Type] ?B2 : [ |- Type]
arrow_rintro : forall (RA : rel ?A1 ?A2) (RB : rel ?B1 ?B2) (f : ?A1 -> ?B1) (g : ?A2 -> ?B2), RIntro (forall (x : ?A1) (y : ?A2), RA x y -> RB (f x) (g y)) (RA ++> RB) f g where ?A1 : [ |- Type] ?A2 : [ |- Type] ?B1 : [ |- Type] ?B2 : [ |- Type]
forall_relim : forall (R : forall (x : ?V1) (x0 : ?V2), ?E x x0 -> rel (?FV1 x) (?FV2 x0)) (f : forall x : ?V1, ?FV1 x) (g : forall x : ?V2, ?FV2 x) (v1 : ?V1) (v2 : ?V2) (e : ?E v1 v2) (P Q : Prop), RElim (R v1 v2 e) (f v1) (g v2) P Q -> RElim (forallr e @ v1 v2, R v1 v2 e) f g P Q where ?V1 : [ |- Type] ?V2 : [ |- Type] ?E : [ |- ?V1 -> ?V2 -> Type] ?FV1 : [ |- ?V1 -> Type] ?FV2 : [ |- ?V2 -> Type]
respectful_rintro : forall (RA : relation ?A) (RB : relation ?B) (f g : ?A -> ?B), RIntro (forall x y : ?A, RA x y -> RB (f x) (g y)) (RA ==> RB)%signature f g where ?A : [ |- Type] ?B : [ |- Type]
Inductive rel_push (A1 A2 B1 B2 : Type) (f : A1 -> B1) (g : A2 -> B2) (R : rel A1 A2) : rel B1 B2 := rel_push_rintro : forall (x : A1) (y : A2), RIntro (R x y) R !! (f, g) (f x) (g y) Arguments rel_push {A1 A2 B1 B2}%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope _%rel_scope Arguments rel_push_rintro {A1 A2 B1 B2}%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope _%rel_scope
